page.title: 14ALL THE SCHOOLS IN SEASCALE.
page.content: Seascale School is an infant and junior school combined.It takes children from the age of 4 to 11 Most children go to Wyndham compre- hensive in Egremont. The former Head- master ,(Mr.Walker),lives in a house that was another old school,built in 1877.Also in 1868 there was a school at the top of Seascale at Cross Lanes where there are now few remains and a rubbish dump nearby.Nobody knows anything about this school.In 1902 Calder Girls School was opened,large Victorian houses converted into school rooms ,dormitorys and dining rooms.Also another private school Seascale Prepartory School for boys.Burnett House still stands but is now flats.
